bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with luo li 瘰癧 , scrofula with pervasion-illness. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry tian nan xing 天南星：痰瘤結核：南星膏治人皮肌頭面上生瘤及結核，大者如 拳，小者如栗，或軟或硬，不疼不癢，宜用此藥 , “ Phlegm tumor and nodular kernel: Ointment with nan xing cures tumors and nodular kernels growing in the skin of a person’s head and face. Large ones are like a fist; small ones are like a chestnut. They may be soft or unyielding. They neither ache nor itch. This medication is suitable for these [ailments]”.
